scripts.pkg: npm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && pkg --targets node18-linux-x64,node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-linux-arm64,node18-win-arm64,node18-macos-arm64 --compress GZip --out-path ./dist src/index.js && cd ./dist && zip -r dist.zip * && cd .. && mv ./dist/dist.zip ./dist.zip && rm -rf ./dist pangscript-*.zip
scripts.publish: git tag -a "$TAG" -m "Release $TAG" && mv ./dist.zip "./pangscript-${TAG}.zip" && gh release create "$TAG" --title "Release $TAG" --notes "" -R https://github.com/FreshPenguin112/pangscript pangscript-"$TAG".zip && rm -rf pangscript-*.zip && rm -rf pangscript-*.zip
